metadata.title: CVE-2017-9301 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: plugins\audio_filter\libmpgatofixed32_plugin.dll in VideoLAN VLC mediaplayer 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalidread and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
